law.catch_line: Employment of technical advisers and others for construction work.
law.text: The president and trustees of the university may employ such persons as they deem necessary, including architects and other technical advisers, to perform any work for which a bond issue has been provided.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2948b-7.
